page.title: 15Political Views(Survey)
page.content: Of the 36 people in the sample, 22 said they voted in the last general election, 3 did not vote, and 11 declined to discuss the matter with us. Of the 22 who did vote the results were as follows:- { Conservative 13 {Labour 3 {Liberal/SDP 6} When questioned as to whether they would still vote for the same party should an election be held tomorrow, 16 of the 22 said that they would still vote for the same party. Out of the six who would change their vote, 4 said that they would now vote for the Liberal/SDP Alliance, whilst the remaining two would now vote Conservative. { {
